column1: New Mexico (MST) SCAN Site Willow Wells - NRCS National Water and Climate Center - Provisional Data - subject to revision as of Thu Oct 16 10:30:23 GMT-08:00 2025. Notes on dates - Daily sensors (e.g. TAVG.D-1) report a summary value for the previous day.  Hourly sensors (e.g. TAVG.H-1) report a summary value for the previous hour.  Instantaneous sensors (e.g. TOBS.I-1) report a single observation on the hour.
